author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest, creepy Carnival Hunt trailer for this upcoming asymmetric horror strategy multiplayer game. In Carnival Hunt, one player takes on the role of the Carnival Monster, and the other players play as the Bunnies. Carnival Hunt will be available on PC, and the open playtest on Steam is available now until October 6, 2025 (10 AM PST).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Carnival Hunt - Official Steam Open Playtest Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:

Electronic Arts has announced plans to sell itself to a consortium of investors led by Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund, Silver Lake, and Affinity Partners (formed by President Donald Trump's son-in-law, Jared Kushner). The deal is worth about $55 billion and will be the largest take-private investment in history. Once finalized, EA will no longer be listed on any stock exchange, and stockholders will receive $210 per share in cash. In other news, IGN spoke with Rockstar Games co-founder Dan houser at LA Comic-Con, and he confirmed he had nothing to do with GTA 6. Houser also explained why they never made Bully 2, among other topics discussed. Houser wrote almost every GTA game, including Red Dead Redemption 2, and left Rockstar in 2020. And finally, Fortnite is disabling a Peacemaker emote following the massive plot twist of the recent HBO Peacemaker episode.

#IGN #TheFix
title: Electronic Arts Goes Private in Massive $55 Billion Deal - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Once you reach Act 2 of Silksong and start exploring the Citadel in Hollow Knight: Silksong, you may stumble across the Great Taste of Pharloom sidequest, which requires you to bring 5 specific ingredients to Loyal Mergwin in exchange for some Pale Oil to upgrade your Needle. Some of these ingredients are painless to collect, while others will take you faraway to places you may not have even seen yet. Here’s how to collect every ingredient (including that pesky Crustnut) for the Great Taste of Pharloom sidequest.

Check out our expanding wiki for more help with collectibles, bosses, exploration and much more.
https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:30 - How to Get In-Game Hints
00:51 - Ingredient #1: Mossberry Stew
01:11 - Ingredient #2: Vintage Nectar
02:47 - Ingredient #3: Courier's Rasher
07:20 - Ingredient #4: Crustnut
09:26 - Ingredient #5: Pickled Muckmaggot
11:37 - Outro

#HollowKnightSilksong #Gaming #IGN
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - Great Taste of Pharloom Sidequest Guide (Second Pale Oil Upgrade)

author: IGN
description:
The film chronicles the making of Bruce Springsteen’s 1982 Nebraska album. Recorded on a four-track recorder in Springsteen’s New Jersey bedroom, the album marked a pivotal time in his life and is considered one of his most enduring works—a raw, haunted acoustic record populated by lost souls searching for a reason to believe. 

Starring Jeremy Allen White as Bruce Springsteen, the film is directed by Scott Cooper from his adaptation of Warren Zanes’ book of the same name. Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere also features Jeremy Strong as Springsteen’s long-time confidant and manager, Jon Landau; Paul Walter Hauser; Odessa Young; Stephen Graham; Gaby Hoffman; David Krumholtz and Matthew Pellicano Jr. 
 
The film is produced by Cooper, Ellen Goldsmith-Vein, Eric Robinson and Scott Stuber. Tracey Landon, Jon F. Vein and Zanes executive produce. The film includes an original score by composer Jeremiah Fraites, cinematography by Masanobu Takayanagi, production design by Stefania Cella, c
title: Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere - Official "Born to Run" Clip (2025) Jeremy Allen White

author: IGN
description: Check out the Gameplay Demo and Release Window Trailer for Huntsman, a first-person survival horror game developed by OnTheHouse Studios. Players will face arachnophobia head-on as the new security guard at Atherton Laboratories with spiders infesting the halls. Survive by dispatching the spiders in the facility and lifting the lockdown to escape in Huntsman, with the demo launching on October 13 alongside the game's launch in November 2025 for PC (Steam).
title: Huntsman - Official Gameplay Demo and Release Window Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Starting Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles can feel overwhelming, with 20 jobs, hundreds of abilities, and a ton of freedom to decide how to build out your team. Let’s help you whittle down the options and look at some really useful early-game abilities for the first few jobs.

author: IGN
description:
Get ready for a spine-chilling time at The Horror Game Awards Halloween Showcase! Your hosts Phil Dickens, Ash Millman and Will Penkeyman will be taking you by the hand to explore a dark forest filled with thrilling new titles, exclusive trailers, and heart-pounding gameplay reveals. Expect special announcements, developer insights, and a few surprises that'll keep you up at night. The show starts on Tuesday September 30 at 11AM PT/2PM EDT/7PM BST. 

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Horror Game Awards Halloween Showcase 2025 Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Titan Quest 2's Northern Beaches chapter update in this new trailer for the action RPG. The Northern Beaches chapter early access update features new locations, new enemies, three bosses, new skills for every mastery, and more. The Northern Beaches chapter update expands Titan Quest 2’s world with more combat variety, environmental storytelling, and strategic depth as you continue your campaign against the Ichthians as you push toward the King of Tides’ stronghold. Titan Quest 2 is out now in Early Access on PC, and the Northern Beaches update arrives on September 30, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Titan Quest 2 - Official Northern Beaches Gameplay Deep Dive Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tune in for all of the latest Call of Duty news and gameplay reveals including: Black Ops 7 Multiplayer and Zombies Live Gameplay premieres; New Warzone Content and Live Gameplay, and more! The show starts on September 30 at 9AM PT.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Call of Duty Next Showcase Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Relax and unwind by cleaning up the world’s biggest corpses. Here's your look at Kaiju Cleanup announcement trailer for the upcoming cleaning simulation game. Kaiju Cleanup will be available on PC.

When colossal alien titans run rampant until getting domed by a railgun, the world finds itself in need of a true hero. That’s you: a Kaiju Cleaner who won’t be perturbed by petty concerns like “workplace injury” or “life expectancy”. After another Kaiju attack on the city, use your tools to clean up vast piles of dead monster until the zone is safe for reconstruction. The Kaiju may be dead, but its corpse is leaking radiation, seeping acidic fluids, concealing explosive organs, and generally making the area inhospitable to any other form of life. You’ll probably die as you go about your work, but that’s fine; send another clone, mop up your corpse, and carry on.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kaiju Cleanup - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Hell Clock trailer for a deep dive into Update 1.1: Clockmaker's Tools, which introduces a crafting system, as well as quality-of-life changes like blessed stash, a search function added to the reliquary, a loadout system, updates to defense, updates to boss fights, and rebalancing of the endgame to the roguelike action RPG. Update 1.1 also features new content, including five new constellations and more. Hell Clock's free update 1.1 is available on PC today, September 29, 2025.

In Hellclock, forge powerful builds with endless loot. Blast through dungeons and unleash inhuman powers in a dark fantasy twist on Brazil’s War of Canudos.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hell Clock - Official Update 1.1: Clockmaker's Tools Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Launch Trailer for Bop It: The Video Game, a rhythmic action game based on the classic Bop It game developed by Alliance. 

Players will follow the classic commands to twist it, pull it, and specifically bop it across a suite of different backgrounds from Shapes, City, Space, Office, and more. Bop It: The Video Game is available now for Nintendo Switch, Mobile, macOS, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #BopIt #RhythmActionGames
title: Bop It: The Video Game - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Teemo Gameplay Reveal Trailer for 2XKO, an upcoming 2v2 fighting game developed by Riot Games. 

Players can get a look at Teemo in action, a small fighter that packs a punch with plenty of mobility tricks up their sleeve. Burrow into the ground, glide across the stage, and more with Teemo for 2XKO, launching into Early Access on October 7 for PC.

#IGN #2XKO #RiotGames
title: 2XKO - Official Teemo Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Shape breathtaking worlds in Terra Firma 2, a vast simulation where your creations evolve through the forces of nature. Sculpt the land, then watch as weather, erosion, and life itself transform your world into a dynamic, living ecosystem—right down to every plant and creature. Watch the Terra Firm 2 trailer to see gameplay and a release date reveal. Terra Firma 2 will be available on Steam on October 27, 2025.

#TerraFirma2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Terra Firma 2 - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Outward 2 gets a new trailer and a release window announcement. Watch the latest Outward 2 trailer for this upcoming action RPG to learn more about the world of Aurai, see combat, and more. 

Outward 2 will be available on PC in summer 2026. Registration for upcoming playtests is now available.

#IGN #Outward2 #RPG
title: Outward 2 - Official Release Window Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Once their alien diamond making machine gets destroyed, the Solar Opposites must face their greatest challenge yet: living their expensive lives on a budget!

When their consumerist habits and expensive hobbies are gone, only their true selves will remain... but will they like who they find? ALSO: The epic story of the people of The Wall has all built to this thrilling and shocking conclusion…

Dan Stevens, Thomas Middleditch, Mary Mack, and Sean Giambrone lead the voice cast.

Solar Opposites is executive produced by Mike McMahan, Josh Bycel and Sydney Ryan. The series is produced by 20th Television Animation.

Season 6 of Solar Opposites premieres Monday, October 13 with 10 episodes on Hulu and Hulu on Disney+.
title: Solar Opposites: Exclusive Season 6 Trailer (2025) Dan Stevens, Thomas Middleditch

author: IGN
description:
Sobakistan: The Land of Dogs gets a new trailer and a playtest announcement. Get a fresh look at gameplay from Sobakistan: The Land of Dogs in this latest trailer for the upcoming darkly satirical narrative game set in a closed-off totalitarian dog-state, told through the eyes of six playable characters. 

The new Sobakistan: The Land of Dogs trailer showcases the game's core mechanic: in Sobakistan, any step could land you in prison. Whether it’s talking to the wrong person, picking up a leaflet, or simply standing where you shouldn’t—there are 27 different ways to get arrested in the demo alone.

Sobakistan: The Land of Dogs will be available on PC, and sign-ups are available now on Steam for the limited public Playtest, scheduled to launch in October 2025.

#Sobakistan #Gaming #IGN
title: Sobakistan: The Land of Dogs - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Join members of the Drago Entertainment development team for a deep dive into the creation of Winter Survival in this latest developer diary for the upcoming story-driven survival game, including how the team developed the narrative structure, the plot inspiration, and more on the creation of this wilderness sim. Winter Survival's full release will be available on Steam and Epic Games Store on November 19, 2025.
title: Winter Survival - Official Developer Diary Video

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Back to War' In-Engine Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4, a remade version of the classic sci-fi strategy RTS developed by KING Art. 

Players will get a new look at gameplay from the upcoming title, showing off the game's enhancements and improvements from the original release. Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 is launching in 2026 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #DawnOfWar4 #Warhammer40k
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 4 - Official 'Back to War' In-Engine Trailer | TGS 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Final Trailer for Zootopia 2, an upcoming Walt Disney Animation Studios film starring Ginnifer Goodwin and Jason Bateman. Zootopia 2 opens in theaters on November 26, 2025.

After cracking the biggest case in Zootopia’s history, rookie cops Judy Hopps (voice of Ginnifer Goodwin) and Nick Wilde (voice of Jason Bateman) find their partnership isn’t as solid as they thought when Chief Bogo (voice of Idris Elba) orders them to join the Partners in Crisis counseling program. But it doesn’t take long for their partnership to be put to the ultimate test when they find themselves on the twisting trail of a mystery tied to the arrival of a venomous snake in the animal metropolis. The trailer, poster and trailer stills are now available to download and share.

While Zootopia 2 introduces Gary De’Snake (voice of Ke Huy Quan), Nibbles (voice of Fortune Feimster) and quokka therapist Dr. Fuzzby (voice of Quinta Brunson), the upcoming feature film also welcomes back a herd of charact
title: Zootopia 2 - Official Final Trailer (2025) Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Ke Huy Quan

author: IGN
description:
Step into the action-packed world of Alien Rogue Incursion, now more accessible than ever before. Originally released in 2024 as a VR exclusive title, this sci-fi shooter has been adapted for a broader audience.

Get ready for Alien Rogue Incursion Evolved Edition, a complete overhaul that strips away the need for a VR headset. This new version has been meticulously adapted to bring the immersive gameplay you've heard about to your TV, making it fully compatible with standard controllers on consoles and mouse and keyboard on PC.

Check out the opening mission running on a PS5 Pro.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Alien Rogue Incursion Gameplay: Non-VR VR Game
